short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Following info from Your Target Page in Twitter (Pure js/no API/no behind the scenes activities)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape followings (page id/page name) from any Twitter page "Your Page / Others Page"

Super Easy:
1.Open a page in Twitter Web (x.com)
2.Open the page owner's followings list
3.Click on the extension start button
-> All followers' name will be extracted and will be saved into your Downloads folder as a TXT file.

Completely FREE

A small part of Twitter Auto Activities Package (from v-User)
v-user.com/twitter
